title: Jewellery

properties.name: description
properties.value: Jewellery is any item that can be worn in the amulet/necklace equipment slot or the ring equipment slot, plus bracelets which are worn in the glove slot. Jewellery can be enchanted to gain special properties. Unenchanted jewellery is purely decorative. Most jewellery can be made using the Crafting skill. Non-members may only craft, enchant or use amulets up to diamond, and cannot use any functional necklaces or rings. If you have the magic level to enchant jewellery, but not the Crafting level to make it, then see what you can buy at Grum's in Port Sarim.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Jewellery

Jewellery is any item that can be worn in the amulet/necklace equipment slot or the ring equipment slot, plus bracelets which are worn in the glove slot. Jewellery can be enchanted to gain special properties. Unenchanted jewellery is purely decorative. Most jewellery can be made using the Crafting skill. Non-members may only craft, enchant or use amulets up to diamond, and cannot use any functional necklaces or rings. If you have the magic level to enchant jewellery, but not the Crafting level to make it, then see what you can buy at Grum's in Port Sarim.

Contents

  • 1 Normal (unenchanted) jewellery
    • 1.1 Crafting
  • 2 Enchanted jewellery
    • 2.1 Amulets
      • 2.1.1 Non-combat, specialised amulets
      • 2.1.2 Translation amulets
    • 2.2 Necklaces
    • 2.3 Rings
    • 2.4 Bracelets

Normal (unenchanted) jewellery[edit | edit source]

Gold can be crafted into plain rings, necklaces, bracelets, or amulets. A player can also craft gold jewellery together with cut gems such as sapphire, emerald, ruby, diamond, dragonstone, onyx, and zenyte. Meanwhile silver jewellery can only be crafted with cut opal, jade, or red topaz. Gem jewellery can be enchanted as noted below.

Unenchanted jewellery
Gemstone Ring Necklace Bracelet (m) Amulet
N/A Gold Gold Gold Gold
Opal Opal Opal Opal Opal
Jade Jade Jade Jade Jade
Red topaz Topaz Topaz Topaz Topaz
Sapphire Sapphire Sapphire Sapphire Sapphire
Emerald Emerald Emerald Emerald Emerald
Pre-nature amulet
Ruby Ruby Ruby Ruby Ruby
Diamond Diamond Diamond Diamond Diamond
Dragonstone Dragonstone Dragonstone Dragonstone Dragonstone
Onyx Onyx Onyx Onyx Onyx
Zenyte Zenyte Zenyte Zenyte Zenyte

Silver can also be crafted into plain tiaras which can be made into replacements for Runecraft talismans by using the tiara with its corresponding talisman at a Runecraft altar. Silver can also be cast into holy and unholy symbols, which may then be strung and blessed.

Crafting[edit | edit source]

The following rates used for experience per hour is 1400 for a gem and metal bar, 1600 for just metal bars, or 960 for a gem and metal bar with stringing.

Warning: The profit margins given in the following table are likely to be inaccurate for all Zenyte jewellery, as complete Zenytes are rarely sold on the Grand Exchange. It is recommended to sum the price of Zenyte shard and onyx for a more accurate price of a Zenyte.

Enchanted jewellery[edit | edit source]

Finished jewellery that have gemstones can be enchanted with cosmic and elemental runes.

Enchanted jewellery
Gemstone Spell Ring Necklace Bracelet (m) Amulet
Opal Lvl-1 Enchant Ring of pursuit Dodgy necklace Expeditious bracelet Amulet of bounty
Jade Lvl-2 Enchant Ring of returning Necklace of passage Flamtaer bracelet Amulet of chemistry
Red topaz Lvl-3 Enchant Efaritay's aid Necklace of faith Bracelet of slaughter Burning amulet
Sapphire Lvl-1 Enchant Ring of recoil Games necklace Bracelet of clay Amulet of magic
Emerald Lvl-2 Enchant Ring of dueling Binding necklace Castle wars bracelet Amulet of defence
Amulet of nature
Ruby Lvl-3 Enchant Ring of forging Digsite pendant Inoculation bracelet Amulet of strength
Diamond Lvl-4 Enchant Ring of life Phoenix necklace Abyssal bracelet Amulet of power
Dragonstone Lvl-5 Enchant Ring of wealth Skills necklace Combat bracelet Amulet of glory
Onyx Lvl-6 Enchant Ring of stone Berserker necklace Regen bracelet Amulet of fury
Zenyte Lvl-7 Enchant Ring of suffering Necklace of anguish Tormented bracelet Amulet of torture

Amulets[edit | edit source]

Amulets are normally associated with a combat statistics advantage, while other jewellery has less defined roles. Amulets do not wear out, although the Amulet of glory needs its additional powers recharged after four uses.

Item Gem Attack Bonuses Defence Bonuses Other Description
Amulet of accuracy N/A +4 +4 +4 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 A reward for Imp Catcher quest, useful for all combat classes.
Amulet of magic Sapphire 0 +10 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 A high magic attack bonus for a low level amulet.
Amulet of defence Emerald 0 0 0 +7 +7 +7 0 0 0 0 Perfect for miners in monster-infested mines.
Amulet of strength Ruby 0 0 0 0 0 0 +10 0 0 0 The "amulet of hitting harder" for melee fighters.
Amulet of power Diamond +6 +6 +6 +6 +6 +6 +6 0 0 +1 The top free-to-play amulet, with good balance for most classes of combat, though a little weaker for a mages attacking targets that cannot reach them.
Amulet of glory Dragonstone +10 +10 +10 +3 +3 +3 +6 0 0 +3 Stronger in attack than defence, but otherwise the premier amulet with additional charge and teleport bonuses, until the fury. The teleport capability is effective up to level 30 Wilderness, while the normal teleport spells fail beyond level 20.
Amulet of fury Onyx +10 +10 +10 +15 +15 +15 +8 0 0 +5 The same attack, better strength, and much better defence than the "glory", also higher prayer bonus. Has no teleports.
Amulet of torture Zenyte +15 0 0 0 0 0 +10 0 0 +2 Requires 75 Hitpoints to equip. Offers the highest melee attack bonuses and is tied for highest melee strength bonus, but offers no defence bonuses.
Gnome amulet N/A 0 0 0 +13 0 0 0 0 0 0 Awarded to players by King Bolren after completion of the Tree Gnome Village quest.
Not amulets, but similar in effect
Holy symbol N/A 0 0 0 +2 +2 +2 0 0 0 +8
Unholy symbol N/A +2 +2 +2 0 0 0 0 0 0 +8
Berserker necklace Onyx -10 0 0 -20 -20 -20 +7 0 0 +3 Increases the amount of damage wearer does when wielding an obsidian melee weapon by 20%.
Necklace of anguish Zenyte 0 0 +15 0 0 0 0 0 +5 +2 Requires 75 Hitpoints to equip. Offers the best-in-slot Ranged attack and Ranged Strength bonus.
Occult necklace N/A 0 +12 0 0 0 0 0 +10% 0 +2 Requires 70 Magic to equip. Is the only neck-slot item to give a magic damage increase.
Dragonbone necklace N/A +10 +10 +10 +2 +2 +2 +2 0 0 +12 Requires 70 Prayer to equip. Has the highest prayer bonus of any piece of equipment. Restores prayer points as bones are buried, and can be combined with the bonecrusher and a hydra tail to create the bonecrusher necklace, which adds the auto-burying effects of the bonecrusher.

Non-combat, specialised amulets[edit | edit source]

Item Gem Lasts for Description
Amulet of bounty Opal 10 uses 25% chance to save seeds when planting them in allotment patches.
Amulet of chemistry Jade 5 uses 5% chance to create a four-dosed potion when brewing potions.
Burning amulet Topaz 5 uses Can teleport the player to various locations in the Wilderness.
Amulet of nature Emerald N/A It can be used to monitor the state of a farming patch.

Translation amulets[edit | edit source]

  • Amulet of ghostspeak: Used in the The Restless Ghost and Ghosts Ahoy quests
  • Amulet of humanspeak: Was used only during the "Evil Bob" random event and not retained; no longer exists
  • Amulet of catspeak: A members only amulet used in one or more cat-related quests
  • M'speak amulet: A members only amulet used in Monkey Madness I quest
  • Camulet: A members only amulet used in Enakhra's Lament's quest

Necklaces[edit | edit source]

At one time, the most limited category of enchantable items, but the full range are now enchantable by members.

Item Gem Lasts for Description
Dodgy necklace Opal 10 uses 25% chance to prevent the player from being stunned and damaged while pickpocketing NPCs.
Necklace of passage Jade 5 uses Can teleport the player to Wizards' Tower, Jorral's Outpost, and the Desert eagle station of the eagle transport system.
Necklace of faith Topaz 1 use Automatically restores the wearer's prayer points by 10% if their hitpoints drop below 20%. Degrades to dust after use.
Games necklace Sapphire 8 uses Transport to Burthorpe Games Room, Barbarian Assault minigame, Corporeal Beast's Cave, Tears of Guthix (after completion of the Tears of Guthix quest), or Wintertodt Camp (must have visited Zeah).
Binding necklace Emerald 16 uses 100% success in making combination runes.
Digsite pendant Ruby 5 uses Transport to Dig Site and Fossil Island. The spell to enchant it is learned during Varrock Museum miniquest
Phoenix necklace Diamond 1 use Automatically restores Hitpoints equivalent to 30% of the max stat if wearer drops below 20%. Has priority over Ring of life.
Skills necklace Dragonstone 4 teleports Allows wearer to teleport to Fishing, Farming, Mining, Crafting, Cooks' and Woodcutting Guilds. Slightly increases chance of getting a casket when big net fishing. Can be recharged at totem in Legends' Guild.
Berserker necklace Onyx N/A Melee Strength raised by 7. Melee Attack reduced by 10. Defence reduced by 20. Prayer raised by 3

Increases the amount of damage wearer does when wielding an obsidian melee weapon by 20%.

Necklace of anguish Zenyte N/A Requires 75 Hitpoints to equip. Ranged Accuracy raised by 15. Ranged Strength raised by 5. Prayer raised by 2.

Offers the best-in-slot Ranged attack and Ranged Strength bonus.

Occult necklace N/A N/A Requires 70 Magic to equip. Magic Accuracy raised by 12. Magic damage raised by 10%. Prayer raised by 2.

Is the only neck-slot item to give a magic damage increase.

Dragonbone necklace N/A N/A Requires 70 Prayer to equip. Accuracy raised by 10. Defence and Strength raised by 2. Prayer raised by 12, the highest prayer bonus of any piece of equipment.

Restores prayer points as bones are buried, and can be combined with the bonecrusher and a hydra tail to create the bonecrusher necklace, which adds the auto-burying effects of the bonecrusher.

Rings[edit | edit source]

Many rings have a limited number of uses before they are destroyed. Charges (uses) cannot transfer to other players; so if you only have one charge left, and you trade rings with someone who has full charges, your new ring will still disappear after one more use, and the other person will still get full use out of his. All enchanted rings are members only except for the ring of forging.

Item Gem Lasts for Description
Ring of pursuit Opal 10 uses 25% chance to reveal the entire track of hunter creatures caught via noose wand.
Ring of returning Jade 5 uses The player will be teleported to their respawn point.
Efaritay's aid Topaz 200 uses The player will be able to attack vampyric creatures with any weapon. The ring consumes one charge per attack.
Ring of recoil Sapphire 40 damage Recoils 10% of the damage done to you onto your attacker, lasts for 40 returned damage.
Ring of dueling Emerald 8 uses Teleport to the Duel Arena, also a quick way to get to Al-Kharid, near the Fire Altar. An alternative teleport location is Castle Wars, with a convenient bank nearby.
Ring of forging Ruby 140 bars Smelt iron with 100% success, instead of 50% - this makes iron excellent Smithing experience if you can buy or make these rings.
Ring of life Diamond 1 use An automatic teleport to the player's respawn point if you get hit while having less than 10% hitpoints remaining - can be a lifesaver, unless your opponent deals fatal damage from more than 10%. Ineffective beyond level 30 Wilderness, as with the Amulet of glory.
Ring of wealth Dragonstone N/A Increased chance of obtaining a rare drop upon hitting the rare drop table on monster kills.
Ring of stone Onyx N/A Turns the wearer into a rock. Effects: Can only talk or unmorph, attempting to move or being attacked will also unmorph. Poison damage and prayer drain are halted while morphed (probably all recovery as well).
Ring of suffering Zenyte N/A It is the best-in-slot defensive ring.
Slayer ring Enchanted gem 8 uses Players can purchase Slayer rings from Slayer masters for 75 Slayer reward points. Players can also purchase the "Ring bling" ability to unlock the ability to craft the rings themselves for a one-time cost of 300 points. Making a ring requires level 75 Crafting. Players must bring an enchanted gem, a gold bar, and a ring mould to a furnace to make the ring.
Easter ring N/A N/A A reward for completing an Easter holiday event. Similar in effect to the Ring of stone, but turns the wearer into an Easter egg. Effects: Can only talk or unmorph, attempting to move or being attacked will also unmorph. Poison damage and prayer drain are halted while morphed (probably all recovery as well).

Bracelets[edit | edit source]

Bracelets are worn in the place of gloves. All enchanted bracelets are members only.

Item Gem Lasts for Description
Expeditious bracelet Opal 30 uses There is a chance to count one of its wearer's Slayer task kills to count as two instead, but granting no additional experience. Must be worn on the killing blow to count.
Flamtaer bracelet Jade 80 uses Each build at the Shades of Mort'ton temple will become substantially more effective.
Bracelet of slaughter Topaz 30 uses There is a 25% chance for a slayer task kill to not count as a kill towards it, but still granting the appropriate Slayer experience. Must be worn on the killing blow to count.
Bracelet of clay Sapphire 28 clay Wearer will mine soft clay rather than hard clay while wearing bracelet.
Castle wars bracelet Emerald 3 games Wielder will do extra 20% of damage against a bearer of their side's flag. Castle Wars bandages heals 50% more to wielders of the bracelet.
Inoculation bracelet Ruby 275 damage Protects the wearer from an amount of disease damage. Breaks when protection has been used up.
Abyssal bracelet Diamond 5 uses Prevents wearer from being skulled when entering the Abyss. Player still suffers from Prayer drain.
Combat bracelet Dragonstone 4 teleports Allows wearer to teleport to Warriors', Champions' and Ranging Guild as well as the Edgeville Monastery. Updates wearer with their Slayer totals every tenth target they need to kill. Can be recharged at totem in Legends' Guild.
Regen bracelet Onyx N/A Doubles the natural Hitpoint recovery.
Tormented bracelet Zenyte N/A It is the best magic item worn in the hand slot, providing the greatest magic attack bonus, as well as a 5% bonus to magical damage.
